You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &searr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&seArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d8/index.htm U+021D8].
  * `&searr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2198/index.htm U+02198].
